result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph J. Ried was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall submit to a DNA sample at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department.  The costs are to be paid at the rate of $50.00 a month beginning January 6, 2017.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph J. Ried

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Request for Payment Plan, Agreement to Make Payments, and Order

Defendant Joseph J. Reid in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea agreement put into the record. Victim rights complied.  Court finds defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waives right to an attorney.  Plea of no contest to Count 1.  Plea colloquy.  Plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court finds defendant guilty and orders court costs, DNA sample and surcharge.  The costs are due $50.00 a month beginning January 6, 2017.  Appeal rights given to defendant.  - rt
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 14, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Order for Appearance at Settlement Conference; Report to Court on Results of Settlement Conference.

*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.  Defendant shall have no contact with S.J.C. - dob: 7-8-83.

Defendant Joseph J. Ried in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney  Court advises defendant of charges and penalties.  Court orders $500.00 signature bond; booking and no contact with S.J.C. - dob:  7-8-83.  Court enters plea of not guilty on defendant's behalf.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 13, 2016 at 10:00 am.  - rt
